text:
I'm optimistic. #JoeBiden & #KamalaHarris are being sworn in next month & the #FDA's authorizing the #covid vaccine.
I've already had #COVID19  twice, but heard you should get the #vaccine even if you had covid so you don't get it yet again
I'm not about the get it a 3rd time. https://t.co/u9B2bkFz4J
